text:
ok, those URL looks like: <https://scan.sv-1.test.global.canton.network.digitalasset.com>

while the doc suggests something like:

 for url in $(curl -fsS -m 5 <https://scan.sv-1.test.global.canton.network.sync.global/api/scan/v0/scans> | jq -r '.scans[].scans[].publicUrl' ); do   echo -n "$url: ";   curl -fsS -m 5 "$url/api/scan/version" | jq -r '.version'; done
curl: (28) Failed to connect to scan.sv-1.test.global.canton.network.sync.global port 443 after 4386 ms: Connection timed out

text: so the 403 means "not whitelisted"?
